verbose_text: To investigate the relationship between proteasomal degradation and SUMO modification and to analyze levels of soluble and insoluble HTT species in the presence of SUMO-1 and SUMO-2, HeLa cells were transiently transfected with 97Q-HTTex1p and treated with MG132 (5 muM).
evidence: levels of soluble and insoluble HTT
